author: mickpletcher
body:
## It would be extremely useful if we could use PowerShell to control storage sense, especially the free up space now

<!-- 
Storage Sense control would help deployment admins when needing to free up space on a drive remotely using PowerShell, especially the free up space for cleaning up a system when it is low on space. 
-->

## Proposed technical implementation details (optional)

<!-- 
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen.
Consider providing an example PowerShell experience with expected result.
-->
title: Storage Sense
